name: z0t
description:
Start from nothing. Absolute zero. Roll around. Jump. Improve. Shapeshift. Become something more. Jump higher. Move faster. Reach places that you were not able to reach before. Become a 1.

Created for Ludum Dare 45.

Development Team: @fancypants, @feko, @zdravkon, @josefk

Controls:

WASD/arrow keys - Move

Space - Jump

Left Shift - Shapeshift
